mapper.select: SELECT e.exam_no examNo , ls.lecture_name lectureName , e.subject_name subjectName , e.exam_title examTitle , e.exam_start_date examStartDate , e.exam_end_date examEndDate FROM exam e INNER JOIN lecture_subject ls USING(subject_name) WHERE ls.lecture_name=#{lectureName} ORDER BY exam_start_date DESC

SELECT z.account_id accountId , z.education_no educationNo , z.lecture_name lectureName , e.exam_no examNo , e.subject_name subjectName , e.exam_title examTitle , e.exam_content examContent , e.exam_start_date examStartDate , e.exam_end_date examEndDate , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exam_submit WHERE education_no= z.education_no AND exam_no = e.exam_no) submitCk FROM exam e INNER JOIN ( SELECT t.account_id, t.lecture_name, t.education_no, ls.subject_name FROM lecture_subject ls INNER JOIN ( SELECT e.account_id, e.education_no, l.lecture_name FROM education e INNER JOIN lecture l USING(lecture_name) WHERE e.account_id='student' AND e.education_state='수강중' )t USING(lecture_name) )z USING(subject_name) WHERE
e.exam_start_date <= CURDATE() AND CURDATE() <= e.exam_end_date
ORDER BY e.exam_end_date DESC
